meanings.sent1: She outreads all her classmates in the reading competition.
meanings.sent2: He always outreads his siblings when it comes to finishing books.
meanings.sent3: The little bookworm outreads everyone in the library, even the librarian!
meanings.sent4: Her passion for reading outreads the boundaries of her small town.
meanings.sent5: His love for reading outreads any obstacle in his way.

meanings.definition: To read more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: During the summer, she outreads her friends by finishing many books.
meanings.sent2: He outreads his classmates by reading a book a day.
meanings.sent3: The book club member outreads everyone else, always finishing the book first.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to reading outreads anyone else's in the group.
meanings.sent5: His determination to outread others is truly inspiring.
